front.title: Transport Layer Security (TLS) Encryption for RADIUS

author.organization: Deutsches Forschungsnetz | German National Research and Education Network

abstract.t: This document specifies a transport profile for RADIUS using Transport Layer Security (TLS) over TCP as the transport protocol. This enables dynamic trust relationships between RADIUS servers. About This Document This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Status information for this document may be found at https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-rieckers-radext-rfc6614bis/. Discussion of this document takes place on the RADIUS EXTensions Working Group mailing list (mailto:radext@ietf.org), which is archived at https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/browse/radext/.
